W
hen this matter was taken up for hearing, Counsel for the Appellant stated that this is an appeal
logged by the Appellant against an Order of the Provincial High Court of Nuwara Eliya in revision
application bearing No. 13/2013, whereby the learned High Court Judge held that High Court has
no jurisdiction to hear and determine the revision application filed by the Respondent-Petitioner
on the basis of a case decided by the Supreme Court namely The Superintendent, Stafford Estate
and Others Vs. Solaimuthu Rasu [2013 (1) SLR 25]. This Court, in similar matters such as case
